name: Bad to the Root
description:
"Bad to the Root is a 2.5D top down game set in the US during Prohibition where you play as Walt Bianchi, a bartender who smuggles alcoholics and brews a special kind of beverage: THE ROOT BEER! Manage your shady business in your speak-easy bar while brewing the precious Root Beer and fight Mobsters who want to steal your hard earned money."

- This game was made in 48h during the Global Game Jam - 

Team Whiskey Industries:

Programmer:
Gabriele Gentili

Game Designers:
Raffella Di Nardo
Lorenzo Vadini
Marco Valerio 3D Artist:
